job.title: Software Engineer I (Java/Cloud)
job.description: The successful candidate must be proficient in at least one programming language (i.e., Java/C#), understand OOP and RDBMS concepts. Must be able to learn and directly contribute to the design and delivery of applications.   •	Participate in the complete software development lifecycle, from requirements through testing. •	Assists in the construction, testing, and debugging of programs in accordance with engineering standards. •	Maintains and documents programs in accordance with engineering standards. •	Maintains technical specifications according to the changes introduced to the code and assist in development of new technical specifications. •	Suggest estimates of efforts required to implement assigned tasks according to the schedule defined by technical management. •	Other duties as required to support and meet the needs of the organization Requirements: •	Bachelor’s Degree in process or completed in related field of study or equivalent experience. •	Up to 4 years of software development experience. •	Experience with Java 8 or above  •	Experience with 1 or more of the following: 	o	Web technologies (HTML5, JavaScript, JQuery, REST). •	Experience with one or more RDBMS (I.e., proficient in SQL). •	Understand OOP and RDBMS concepts. •	Knowledge of SDLC. •	Good interpersonal, communications skills and ability to work independently. •	Strong analytical and problem solving skills and proficient technical writing. •	Working knowledge of Software Version Control systems. •	Preferred: Experience with microservices based architecture and AWS
